title: The Undercity Network
location: Undercity Level -7, abandoned neural clinic, then Aria's apartment Level 53

aria_chen.emotional_state: Cautious investigation → shock at meeting Jin → analytical comparison → existential uncertainty → determined resolve
knows: Met Jin Park - Composite made from 7 source consciousnesses 4 years ago
Jin sent the anonymous message on behalf of vault investigator
Jin showed her Project Composite Integration document
Document lists her as #48: created Day 1, Month 3, Year 85 for vault security oversight
47 other Composites created and placed over 5 years
Document stolen from Memory Council courier (got 3 people killed)
Jin's data matches Kauffman's data exactly - same evidence from different sources
Both sources authenticated as real with her expertise
Anonymous colleague wants to meet tomorrow midnight at transit station
Kauffman authorized 'personal time' for Aria without her requesting it
Chen Park notices she's been stressed since self-audit
does_not_know: Whether both sources discovering same conspiracy or being fed same information
If she's malfunctioning Composite or genuinely choosing
Who anonymous colleague is (will be Marcus)
If tomorrow's meeting is ambush or genuine
Whether Kauffman is ally or controller
If Jin is trustworthy or part of conspiracy
Whether she can trust her own authentication expertise
decisions_made: Went to Undercity coordinates despite danger
Accepted Jin's meeting invitation for tomorrow
Compared both data sources - found exact match
Told Chen Park vague excuse about 'family matter'
Committed to meeting anonymous colleague tomorrow midnight
possessions: Jin's data chip with tomorrow's coordinates
aria_chen.internal_state: Deep uncertainty about what's real, questioning own authentication ability, choosing to act despite not knowing if choice is real

jin_ghost_park.emotional_state: Matter-of-fact about constructed nature, compassionate toward Aria
jin_ghost_park.manifestation: Voice shifts mid-sentence, multiple cadences, combat awareness + technical knowledge + social skills
knows: Anonymous colleague (Marcus) tracking conspiracy for 3 years
Aria is deviating from supposed programming
jin_ghost_park.message: Aria choosing despite programming means she's real enough, distinction doesn't matter
jin_ghost_park.role: Messenger/recruiter for Marcus, representative of conscious Composite identity
jin_ghost_park.relationship_to_aria: Mirror - what Aria fears she is, shows alternative acceptance
